references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, a foundational model for the 3D generation methods discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: LAION-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: This paper introduces LAION-5B, a large-scale dataset crucial for training the 2D diffusion models which underpin the 3D generation techniques in the target paper.

This paper introduces DreamFusion, a seminal work directly employing 2D diffusion models for 3D shape generation, forming the basis for Score Distillation Sampling (SDS) and this paper's improvements.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, providing the theoretical foundation for the diffusion models used extensively in both 2D and 3D generation within this paper.

references.paper_title: Instant neural graphics primitives with a multiresolution hash encoding
references.reason: This paper introduces Instant Neural Graphics Primitives (InstantNGP), a key component used in many 3D shape representations which are optimized in the 3D generation process discussed.
